alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 14 at 7:46PM MDT until March 15 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MDT WEDNESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County including Bordeaux along Interstate 25 between Wheatland and Chugwater. * WHEN...From 3 AM until 9 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph, or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
